question_presentation.description: Gather user feedback on the presentation of questions, specifically focusing on clarity, relevance, and ease of understanding.

parameters.prompt_format: Was the prompt 'Which answer best suits you?' effective in setting the context for each question?
parameters.labeling: Were the answer options labeled clearly as 'A' and 'B'?

interaction_process.description: Collect user feedback on the flow of the test, including how easy it was to navigate and understand the questions presented.

parameters.one_at_a_time: Did displaying one question at a time make the test easier to understand and complete?
parameters.ease_of_use: Was it easy to select an answer and move to the next question?

assessment_feedback.description: Request user input regarding their experience with the assessment results, including the accuracy of the identified communication styles.

parameters.style_accuracy: Did the communication styles identified reflect your natural tendencies?
parameters.blended_styles: If applicable, did the description of blended styles resonate with you?
parameters.result_clarity: Was the explanation of your primary, secondary, and tertiary styles clear?

suggestions.description: Allow participants to provide suggestions for improvement, specifically in relation to the questions, test flow, and assessment results.

parameters.general_improvements: Do you have any suggestions for improving the clarity or accuracy of the questions or results?
parameters.additional_feedback: Is there anything else you would like us to know about your experience with the test?
